title: Samir Kochhar going on all-boys trip with friends to Kazakhsthan | bollywood | Hindustan Times
text:
Desimartini Samir Kochhar going on all-boys trip with friends to Kazakhsthan 
Actor Samir Kochhar and his gang of boys might go for a vacation to Amsterdam and also attend music festivals across the globe. bollywood Updated: Feb 17, 2017 18:38 IST Hindustan Times, New Delhi Next, Samir Kochhar and his gang of boys might go for a vacation to Amsterdam.(Aalok Soni/HT Photo) 
Actor-host Samir Kochhar is all set for an all-boys trip to Kazakhstan. He and his friends are heading out on Feb 28 for five days, and it goes without saying, he can’t contain his excitement. 
“It took us 35 years to plan it and actually three months to get on to actually doing it. We had always talked about doing an all-boys trip but eventually, we ended up doing the regular Goa, North destinations or tons of them with family. This was in our minds always and we are glad that it is finally happening,” he smiles. Read more Abhishek Bachchan and I can change fate of basketball in India: Satnam Singh Bhamara 
Samir and gang are planning to do something “interesting and off beat” in Kazakhsthan. “The five of us are madly looking forward to five days of pure bliss. We plan to be in Almaty. It’s a beautiful ski-ing destination too. So bonding over good food, skiing, snowmobiling, bonfires and lot of other interesting things are in our list,” adds Samir, who is known for films such as Zeher, Island City and Housefull 3. 
After Kazakhsthan, the group hopes to make more travel plans together. “We want to try Amsterdam next and also music festivals across the globe,” says Samir. 
Follow @htshowbiz for more
